name: I Love Trees
description:
I Love Trees is a serene, Bob Ross-inspired  Art creation game via the medium of 2D Arcade Shoot-’em-Up, mechanically similar to the Atari 2600 game Missile Command. The player is given an infinite supply of paintbrushes, some guilders and a minute's time,  all for the player to utilise as they see fit- for there are no 'mistakes' when creating art for one's amusement or pleasure, but rather 'happy accidents'.

Background track is 'Tulip Kingdom' by MichaeL Macasiano

background in 'Old Background' version is  SNOWY MOUNTAIN DREAM, OIL ON CANVAS by Mary Derrick. background in the normal version was painted by me.

Known issues (valid as of: 15/06/2021)

- Score does not reset when loading the level from the 'retry' button in the game over screen

- Game Over scene does not appear when the level has been loaded from the 'retry' button on the game over screen.
